title: Is the .org domain good for a business site? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have business than i will suggest you for .com domain.Its the perfect extension for the business purpose.Domain extension was originally intended for non-profit or trade organizations. Again, this is no longer the case and is generally registered by anyone looking to protect their main domain by registering all available domain extensions or simply because a better extension isn't available for registration.
Not good - .org stands for organization — usually non-profits. When you are a business, your website should be a standard .com .com domains are cheap too, $8.99 at NAMESILO .
